did.unittitle: Elizabeth Gurney Fry letter to unidentified Quaker acquaintance
did.abstract: Letter is to an unidentified Quaker acquaintance describing a German prison. Fry focuses on women prisoners, crowded prison hospitals, and the use of iron restraints. Fry requested that the recipient intercede with the king to improve conditions.
